headline.main: Factbox: Details of GM's Sale of Opel to PSA
headline.print_headline: Factbox: Details of GM's Sale of Opel to PSA

lead_paragraph: France's PSA Group said on Monday it agreed to buy Opel and its British Vauxhall brand from General Motors in a deal valuing the business at 2.2 billion euros ($2.3 billion).
snippet: France's PSA Group said on Monday it agreed to buy Opel and its British Vauxhall brand from General Motors in a deal valuing the business at 2.2 billion euros ($2.3 billion)....
